short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A fresh shot of inspiration with every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspresso is a replacement for the new tab screen, featuring a nicely designed quote hovering over a curated collection of beautiful black and white photos. A new photo is featured every day.

Inspresso is built to be customizable so you can showcase your unique style. The quote, plus various aspects of the design, can be tweaked to suit your taste. And you can easily change the background photo to whatever you like.

Inspresso is still a work-in-progress! There are plenty of new features planned. Have an idea that you think would make Inspresso way cooler? Let me know! I would love to hear any feedback you have.

Enjoy!
